headline: Genuine Parts Governance Shift And Canadian Expansion Shape Growth Story
summary: Genuine Parts (NYSE:GPC) has announced that CEO Will Stengel will become Chairman and CEO following the retirement of Non Executive Chairman Paul D. Donahue. The company is also expanding its North American footprint with a pending acquisition of Benson Auto Parts in Canada. Genuine Parts, trading at $147.16, has delivered a 64.9% return over the past 5 years, with shares up 18.7% year to date and 21.6% over the past year. In this context, the upcoming shift to a combined Chairman and CEO...
